titleStmt.title: An item to his Majestie concerning Prince Rupert and his cavaliers. Or, A looking-glasse, wherein His Majesty may see his nephews love; vvho secretly under pretence of assisting him, to gain an absolute prerogative or arbitrary power, will disthrone him to set up himselfe. / Written by a welwisher to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Welwisher to His Majesty.

publicationStmt.date: Printed, in the year of the King of Kings 1642 [i.e. 1643]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
